name: Vessel_Name
description: Name of the vessel as recorded in official documentation.

name: Report_Type
description: Type of report submitted (e.g., Noon, Arrival, Departure).

name: Total_VLSFOAX_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total Very Low Sulphur Fuel Oil (VLSFO) consumed, in metric tons.

name: Total_VLSGOAX_Consumed_In_MT
description: Operational or performance parameter related to vessel monitoring and reporting.

name: Draft_FWD
description: Forward draft of the vessel measured at the bow in meters.

name: Draft_AFT
description: Aft draft of the vessel measured at the stern in meters.

name: Total_Live_HFO_Consumed_In_MT
description: Operational or performance parameter related to vessel monitoring and reporting.

name: Total_Live_Real_SFO_Consumed_In_MT
description: Operational or performance parameter related to vessel monitoring and reporting.

name: Voyage_Start_Date
description: Date and time when the voyage commenced.

name: Report_Date_Time
description: Timestamp when this report was generated or logged.

name: Latitude
description: Latitude position of the vessel at the time of reporting.

name: Longitude
description: Longitude position of the vessel at the time of reporting.

name: Voyage_Number
description: Unique identifier assigned to this voyage.

name: Start_Port
description: Port of origin or departure of the vessel.

name: Final_Destination_Port
description: Final intended destination port of the vessel.

name: Avg_Speed
description: Average speed maintained by the vessel during this reporting period, in knots.

name: Average_Speed_Since_SOV
description: Average vessel speed since start of voyage (SOV), in knots.

name: Distance
description: Distance covered by the vessel during this report period, in nautical miles.

name: Distance_Covered_Since_SOV
description: Distance covered by the vessel during this report period, in nautical miles.

name: Distance_Remaining_To_EOV
description: Distance covered by the vessel during this report period, in nautical miles.

name: ME_Running_Hrs
description: Main Engine running hours during this report period.

name: Total_ME_Running_Hrs_Since_SOV
description: Main Engine running hours during this report period.

name: ME_RPM
description: Main Engine revolutions per minute (RPM).

name: Slip
description: Propeller slip percentage derived from speed and RPM.

name: Wind_Speed
description: Measured wind speed at reporting time, in knots.

name: Sea_Height
description: Observed height of the sea waves, in meters.

name: Swell_Height
description: Observed height of ocean swells, in meters.

name: Douglas_Sea_State
description: Sea condition rating as per Douglas Sea Scale.

name: Remaining_On_Board_HFO_In_MT
description: Quantity of specific fuel or material remaining onboard, in metric tons.

name: Remaining_On_Board_VLSFO_In_MT
description: Quantity of specific fuel or material remaining onboard, in metric tons.

name: Remaining_On_Board_VLSGO_In_MT
description: Quantity of specific fuel or material remaining onboard, in metric tons.

name: Remaining_On_Board_ULSGO_In_MT
description: Quantity of specific fuel or material remaining onboard, in metric tons.

name: Remaining_On_Board_MECYL_In_MT
description: Quantity of specific fuel or material remaining onboard, in metric tons.

name: Remaining_On_Board_LSMECYL_In_MT
description: Quantity of specific fuel or material remaining onboard, in metric tons.

name: Remaining_On_Board_MECC_In_MT
description: Quantity of specific fuel or material remaining onboard, in metric tons.

name: Remaining_On_Board_AECC_In_MT
description: Quantity of specific fuel or material remaining onboard, in metric tons.

name: Remaining_On_Board_FW_In_MT
description: Quantity of specific fuel or material remaining onboard, in metric tons.

name: Total_HFO_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total heavy fuel oil (HFO) consumed during this reporting period, in metric tons.

name: Total_HFOME_Consumed_In_MT
description: Operational or performance parameter related to vessel monitoring and reporting.

name: Total_HFOAE_Consumed_In_MT
description: Operational or performance parameter related to vessel monitoring and reporting.

name: Total_HFOBLR_Consumed_In_MT
description: Operational or performance parameter related to vessel monitoring and reporting.

name: Total_VLSFO_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total Very Low Sulphur Fuel Oil (VLSFO) consumed, in metric tons.

name: Total_VLSFOME_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total Very Low Sulphur Fuel Oil (VLSFO) consumed, in metric tons.

name: Total_VLSFOBLR_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total Very Low Sulphur Fuel Oil (VLSFO) consumed, in metric tons.

name: Total_VLSGO_Consumed_In_MT
description: total consumption of vlsgo fule

name: Total_VLSGOME_Consumed_In_MT
description: Operational or performance parameter related to vessel monitoring and reporting.

name: Total_VLSGOBLR_Consumed_In_MT
description: Operational or performance parameter related to vessel monitoring and reporting.

name: Total_ULSGO_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total Ultra Low Sulphur Gas Oil (ULSGO) consumed, in metric tons.

name: Total_ULSGOME_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total Ultra Low Sulphur Gas Oil (ULSGO) consumed, in metric tons.

name: Total_ULSGOAE_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total Ultra Low Sulphur Gas Oil (ULSGO) consumed, in metric tons.

name: Total_ULSGOBLR_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total Ultra Low Sulphur Gas Oil (ULSGO) consumed, in metric tons.

name: Total_MECYL_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total cylinder oil used for main engine lubrication, in metric tons.

name: Total_LSMECYL_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total cylinder oil used for main engine lubrication, in metric tons.

name: Total_MECC_Consumed_In_MT
description: Operational or performance parameter related to vessel monitoring and reporting.

name: Total_AECC_Consumed_In_MT
description: Total auxiliary engine cylinder oil consumption, in metric tons.

name: Total_FW_Consumed
description: Freshwater consumption or remaining freshwater in metric tons.

name: ETA_Next_Port
description: Estimated Time of Arrival at the next port of call.

name: Next_Port
description: Name of the next port the vessel is heading to.
